title: Pinball Arcade v1.2.0 [iPhone/iPod Touch/iPad]
description:

Tales of the Arabian NightsÃ¢â€žÂ¢ is fully unlocked.

This update features Table Pack 7, including the Bally Halloween classic Scared StiffÃ¢â€žÂ¢ featuring Elvira and our first true electrectro-mechanical pin, GottliebÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s classic Big ShotÃ¢â€žÂ¢. 

There is a new Pro Version of the Tales of the Arabian Nights table which gives you access to the Operators Menu, Ball Control, and other cool bonus features. 

Each month, regular updates will add on classics like Twilight ZoneÃ‚Â®, Attack from MarsÃ¢â€žÂ¢, Dr. DudeÃ¢â€žÂ¢, VictoryÃ¢â€žÂ¢, Space ShuttleÃ‚Â®, PinÃ¢â‚¬Â¢BotÃ¢â€žÂ¢, (and many others for years to come!) along with online tournaments and additional modes to challenge yourself and compete against your friends.

Our goal is for the Pinball Arcade to become the most realistic and comprehensive pinball game ever created. Please support us in our efforts to preserve these tables and join the indelible part of Americana that is pinball!
